modName: Aela the Huntress and her little sis Leah
summary: This is my vision of Aela i hope you will enjoy it.
descriptionHtml:
Update 2: Updated stand alone  Leah companion she can be found in Jorrvaskr living area now

Update: Made Leah as a Ria replacer and  renamed her to Sakal (since Farkas/Vilkas means wolf in hungurian/lithuanian i found name Sakal wich means jackal in hungurian more suited for her) also tweaked with her stats a bit from 1h warior heavy armor user to stealth light armor bow user. 

Replaces look of companion Aela the huntress to a bit more attractive. 
Adds new Companion sister of Aela a potential follower Leah. She can be your follower only if you are a Harbringer of Companions she wont be too friendly before that. Leah can be found in Jorrvaskr main hall

To get exact same look you will require:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563]Coverwomen by mrLenski[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6953]BFG - Better FaceGen by Radioragae[/url]

Recomended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30050]Sub Surface Full Body Map for Coverwomen and UNP UNPB Bodies by MrTroubleMaker[/url] Will fix neck/body color diference


Equipment:
Armor- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8561]Mongol Armor Standalone by Cokla[/url]
Cloak- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea[/url]
Lipring- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13469]Piercing by newermind43[/url]
Earrings- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11130]HN66s Earrings by humannature66[/url]

This is my 1st mod so if there are some bugs or something is not working let me know ill try to fix it
author: gdulal
